title.narrative: DKPTO - Exchange of Best Practices in the field of IPR

description.narrative:
The grant forms part of an MoU for bilateral cooperation between the Directorate General of Intellectual Property (DGIP) Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic of Indonesia and the Danish Patent and Trademark Office (DKPTO) encompassing exchanges of best practices, experiences, and knowledge between the two parties.
The objective of the project is institutional capacity building in the field of intellectual property rights to promote innovation and economic growth in Indonesia as a transition and growth economy.
The grant will support three outputs contributing to institutional capacity building in the field of intellectual property rights, consisting seven webinars for knowledge exchanges, and three study visits to Denmark.

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
